body.p: Mustered into service at Eminence, Kentucky, on August 22, 1862. Two companies served as body guard to General William "Bull" Nelson at the Battle of Richmond, Kentucky, on August 29-30, 1862. Advanced as part of the Army of the Ohio towards Perryville, and pursued Braxton Bragg's Army of Tennessee from Kentucky after the Battle of Perryville. Engaged in the pursuit of John Hunt Morgan in the summer of 1863, and participated in the destruction of his command at Buffington Island, Ohio on July 26, 1863. Mustered out of service at Eminence, Kentucky, on September 11, 1863. Commander(s): Richard Taylor Jacob, John Boyle.
